professional_summary: Experienced SQL Database Administrator and Systems Analyst with expertise in managing and optimizing large-scale database environments. Proficient in implementing high-availability solutions, performance tuning, storage management, and data security across various platforms including on-premises and cloud (AWS EC2) environments. Strong background in migrating databases to cloud platforms, configuring log shipping, replication, and failover clustering. Adept at troubleshooting complex issues and improving system performance through root cause analysis.

key_responsibilities: Applied service packs/hotfixes on SQL Server instances to address security vulnerabilities and upgrade related issues.
Migrated and upgraded SQL Server 2005/2008 to SQL Server 2012/2014
and jobs for a side-by-side upgrade/migration.
Managed Backup/Restore and Point-in-Time Recovery including backup verification and security.
and troubleshooting Log Shipping/Replication (Transactional and Merge).
Configured and maintained SQL Server 2012 Fail-Over Clustering and Always-On Availability Groups.
and performance optimization services for various clients.
Conducted regular performance tuning and root cause analysis to optimize database performance.
Managed storage solutions and ensured data security compliance with industry standards.
